0010000001100000
0001000101000000




0010100000000000
0010100000000000
0010100000000000
0010100000000000
0001100101000000

//add operation reg1, reg2
0001100101000000
0000000000000111





//not operation req3
0010000001100000
0000000000000111

//ldm form reg 1 to 7
0000100000100000
0000000000000001
0000100001000000
0000000000000010
0000100001100000
0000000000000011
0000100010000000
0000000000000100
0000100010100000
0000000000000101
0000100011000000
0000000000000110
0000100011100000
0000000000000111

//store r1, r2
0001000101000000
0000000000000111
//will be 
//address r1, value r2
0001001000100000


ldd r1, r2
r2 = mem[r1]

1-no operation
2-load r1
3-immediate value
4-load r2
5-immediate value
6-load r3
7-immediate value
8-no opetaion
9-no opetarion
10-add r1, r2
11-no operation
12-not r3
13-store r1, r2
